name: __EAbilityTaskWaitState
doc:
Latent tasks are waiting on something. This is to differeniate waiting on the user to do something vs waiting on the game to do something.
Tasks start WaitingOnGame, and are set to WaitingOnUser when appropriate (see WaitTargetData, WaitIiputPress, etc)

WaitingOnGame: Task is waiting for the game to do something
WaitingOnUser: Waiting for the user to do something
WaitingOnAvatar: Waiting on Avatar (Character/Pawn/Actor) to do something (usually something physical in the world, like land, move, etc)
